New Records: Rohit Sharma scored the fastest T20 fifty in his career, reaching 50 off 19 balls
Key Match Events: Travis Head's 76 off 43 balls kept Australia in the hunt
Axar Patel's acrobatic catch dismissed Mitchell Marsh
Jasprit Bumrah's loopy slower off-cutter induced a false shot to have Head caught
Post-Match Reflections: India will face England in the second semifinal in Guyana on June 27
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on the same surface where South Africa defended 163 against England
The east-to-west wind blowing at 21 kph had an impact on the game
India maintained a right-left batting combination to counter Adam Zampa
Others: Rohit Sharma's aggressive footwork against pacers was pivotal
India's strategy of maintaining a right-left batting combination paid off, yielding 41 off Zampa's four overs
